DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the effects of Prevena therapy on decreasing groin surgical site infections in patients who are obese and /or diabetic having vascular surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Prevena Therapy on Obese and or Diabetic Patients With Surgical Groin Sites
DOC.detailed_description: Patients who are obese and/or diabetic may have poor surgical healing and infection rates higher. The PREVENA therapy will be used to evaluate possible reduction of infection rates in this patient population
DOC.criteria: subjects over 18 years old obese (BMI > 30) and or diabetic current infected surgical field, hemodialysis, immunosuppressive therapy, allergy to adhesive, sensitivity to silver
